The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 January is 2,497,824 (4,437.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 January, there were 344,555 new confirmed cases (612.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 December, there were 228,089 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 51% (116,466 extra cases).
